Text: Thanks for the effort, but is there any chance for a smaller version?
right now this is the ony one... else wait for a rerip... some one might do...but quality may b affected unless the new has a bluray source...

It's strange.. sometime I lament not being able to find 1080p copies of movies and now I lament not having a smaller version.  

Guess I watch this at a later date.  Props on the effort though, I'll enjoy it that much more when I eventually watch it.

I watch, and I enjoy.

Your effort is greatly appreciated.  Thank you.
